price: 18. They are deaf, dumb, and blind, so they return not (to the Right Path).
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
